text: "'Always" is a song by American recording artist Trina. It features guest vocals by singer Monica and was written by Derrick Baker, Josh Augustus Burke, Cainon Lamb, and Michael Sterling and co-produced by Bigg D and Lamb for her fifth studio album, Amazin (2010). ==Formats and track listings== These are the formats and track listings of major single-releases of "Always." ;Digital single #"Always" (featuring Monica) — 4:01 #"Always" (featuring Monica) — 4:01 #"Always" — 4:01 ==Charts== {|class="wikitable" |- !align="left"|Chart (2010) !align="left"|Peak position |- |- |} ==Release history== {|class="wikitable" !Region !Format !Date |- |rowspan="1"|Worldwide |Internet leak |March 20, 2010 |- |rowspan="1"|United States |digital download |April 20, 2010 |- |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:2010 singles Category:Trina songs Category:Monica (singer) songs Category:2010 songs Category:EMI Records singles Category:Songs written by Trina Category:Songs written by Cainon Lamb Category:Songs written by Bigg D
title: Always (Trina song)
